trans-unit.source: Extend the basic functionality of Cortana with voice commands that launch and execute a single action in an external application.
trans-unit.target: Extend the basic functionality of Cortana with voice commands that launch and execute a single action in an external application.

trans-unit.source: Cortana interactions
trans-unit.target: Cortana interactions

trans-unit.source: Cortana interactions in UWP apps
trans-unit.target: Cortana interactions in UWP apps

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Extend the basic functionality of **Cortana** with voice commands that launch and execute a single action in an external application.
trans-unit.target: Extend the basic functionality of **Cortana** with voice commands that launch and execute a single action in an external application.

trans-unit.source: Other speech components
trans-unit.target: Other speech components

trans-unit.source: See the [Speech design guidelines](speech-interactions.md) if integrating speech recognition and text-to-speech (also known as TTS, or speech synthesis) directly into your app.
trans-unit.target: See the [Speech design guidelines](speech-interactions.md) if integrating speech recognition and text-to-speech (also known as TTS, or speech synthesis) directly into your app.

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: A voice command is a single utterance with a specific intent, defined in a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file, directed at an installed app through **Cortana**.
trans-unit.target: A voice command is a single utterance with a specific intent, defined in a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file, directed at an installed app through **Cortana**.

trans-unit.source: A voice command definition can vary in complexity.
trans-unit.target: A voice command definition can vary in complexity.

trans-unit.source: It can support anything from a single, constrained utterance to a collection of more flexible, natural language utterances, all denoting the same intent.
trans-unit.target: It can support anything from a single, constrained utterance to a collection of more flexible, natural language utterances, all denoting the same intent.

trans-unit.source: A VCD file defines one or more voice commands, each with a unique intent.
trans-unit.target: A VCD file defines one or more voice commands, each with a unique intent.

trans-unit.source: The target app can be launched in the foreground (the app takes focus and **Cortana** is dismissed) or activated in the background (**Cortana** retains focus but provides results from the app), depending on the complexity of the interaction.
trans-unit.target: The target app can be launched in the foreground (the app takes focus and **Cortana** is dismissed) or activated in the background (**Cortana** retains focus but provides results from the app), depending on the complexity of the interaction.

trans-unit.source: For example, voice commands that require additional context or user input are best handled in a foreground app, while basic commands can be handled in **Cortana** through a background app.
trans-unit.target: For example, voice commands that require additional context or user input are best handled in a foreground app, while basic commands can be handled in **Cortana** through a background app.

trans-unit.source: By integrating the basic functionality of your app, and providing a central entry point for the user to accomplish most of the tasks without opening your app directly, **Cortana** becomes a liaison between your app and the user.
trans-unit.target: By integrating the basic functionality of your app, and providing a central entry point for the user to accomplish most of the tasks without opening your app directly, **Cortana** becomes a liaison between your app and the user.

trans-unit.source: Providing this shortcut to app functionality and reducing the need to switch apps can save the user significant time and effort.
trans-unit.target: Providing this shortcut to app functionality and reducing the need to switch apps can save the user significant time and effort.

trans-unit.source: Article
trans-unit.target: Article

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Design guidelines
trans-unit.target: Design guidelines

trans-unit.source: These guidelines and recommendations describe how your app can best use **Cortana** to interact with the user, help them accomplish a task, and communicate clearly how it's all happening.
trans-unit.target: These guidelines and recommendations describe how your app can best use **Cortana** to interact with the user, help them accomplish a task, and communicate clearly how it's all happening.

trans-unit.source: Launch a foreground app with voice commands
trans-unit.target: Launch a foreground app with voice commands

trans-unit.source: In addition to using voice commands within Cortana to access system features, you can also use voice commands through Cortana to launch a foreground app and specify an action or command to execute within the app.
trans-unit.target: In addition to using voice commands within Cortana to access system features, you can also use voice commands through Cortana to launch a foreground app and specify an action or command to execute within the app.

trans-unit.source: Dynamically modify VCD phrase lists
trans-unit.target: Dynamically modify VCD phrase lists

trans-unit.source: Learn how to access and update the list of supported phrases (PhraseList elements) in a VCD file using the speech recognition result at run time.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to access and update the list of supported phrases (PhraseList elements) in a VCD file using the speech recognition result at run time.

trans-unit.source: Launch a background app with voice commands
trans-unit.target: Launch a background app with voice commands

trans-unit.source: In addition to using voice commands within Cortana to access system features, you can also extend Cortana with features and functionality from a background app using voice commands that specify an action or command to execute within the app.
trans-unit.target: In addition to using voice commands within Cortana to access system features, you can also extend Cortana with features and functionality from a background app using voice commands that specify an action or command to execute within the app.

trans-unit.source: Interact with a background app
trans-unit.target: Interact with a background app

trans-unit.source: Learn how a user can interact with a background app through the Cortana voice and canvas during the execution of a voice command.
trans-unit.target: Learn how a user can interact with a background app through the Cortana voice and canvas during the execution of a voice command.

trans-unit.source: Deep link to a background app
trans-unit.target: Deep link to a background app

trans-unit.source: Provide deep links from the background app service in Cortana to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.
trans-unit.target: Provide deep links from the background app service in Cortana to launch the app to the foreground in a specific state or context.

trans-unit.source: Support natural language voice commands
trans-unit.target: Support natural language voice commands

trans-unit.source: Learn how to extend Cortana with more flexible and natural voice commands, so a user can say your app's name anywhere in the command.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to extend Cortana with more flexible and natural voice commands, so a user can say your app's name anywhere in the command.
